mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articleReply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, articleId = #{articleId}, displayStatus = 1, readStatus = 0
mapper.select: SELECT AR.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM articleReply AS AR INNER JOIN member AS M ON AR.memberId = M.id WHERE AR.articleId = #{articleId} AND AR.displayStatus = 1 AND AR.id >= #{from} ORDER BY AR.id ASC
